verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that one <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, Behold, thy <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2470>sick<s%>: and he <S%H3947>took<s%> with him his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

And one <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> unto thee: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> upon the <S%H4296>bed<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto me at <S%H3870>Luz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Behold, I will make thee <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> of thee a <S%H6951>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%>; and will <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>thee<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%>.

¶ And now thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, which were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> unto thee into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, are mine; as <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, they shall be mine.

And thy <S%H4138>issue<s%>, which thou <S%H3205>begettest<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, shall be thine, and shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And as for me, when I <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Padan<s%>, <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, <S%H5750>when<s%> yet there was but a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H672>Ephrath<s%>: and I buried <S%H6912>her<s%> there in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H672>Ephrath<s%>; the same is <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who are these?

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, They are my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me in this place. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Bring <S%H3947>them<s%>, I pray thee, unto me, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them.

Now the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3513>dim<s%> for <S%H2207>age<s%>, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%>. And he brought them <S%H5066>near<s%> unto him; and he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> them, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> them.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, I had not <S%H6419>thought<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>: and, lo, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>shewed<s%> me also thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H5973>between<s%> his <S%H1290>knees<s%>, and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H8147>both<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> left <S%H8040>hand<s%>, and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and brought them <S%H5066>near<s%> unto him.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it upon <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%>, who was the <S%H6810>younger<s%>, and his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> upon <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%>, <S%H7919>guiding<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H7919>wittingly<s%>; for <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> whom my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> did <S%H1980>walk<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H7462>fed<s%> me all my life <S%H5750>long<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>,

The <S%H4397>Angel<s%> which <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> me from all <S%H7451>evil<s%>, <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5288>lads<s%>; and let my <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>named<s%> on them, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>; and let them <S%H1711>grow<s%> into a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7896>laid<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, it <S%H3415%H5869>displeased<s%> him: and he held <S%H8551>up<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, to <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> unto <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, Not so, my <S%H1>father<s%>: for this is the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>; <S%H7760>put<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> it, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: he also shall become a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he also shall be <S%H1431>great<s%>: but <S%H199>truly<s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be <S%H1431>greater<s%> than he, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall become a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In thee shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> thee as <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: and he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, Behold, I <S%H4191>die<s%>: but <S%H430>God<s%> shall be with you, and bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Moreover I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>portion<s%> above thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, which I <S%H3947>took<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> with my <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with my <S%H7198>bow<s%>.
